channel.title: Zero Hour
channel.description:
Ah yes, I know I had this up a while ago, but had to close the development due to personal reasons, now, this time I'll be using Hyperion, I've already gotten some work done, but we have a lot more to do on this base, which is why I'm reaching out for help.
To begin, here is the application, you [b]must[/b] use this layout if you wish to participate in this development. [code] Name: Skype: Years programming: Have you done any work outside of RSPS? Time zone: List some work you have done in RSPS: What can you do for this development? What kind of work would you prefer doing for Zero Hour (Client, core, content development, etc.)? Are you experienced with using Github? [/code] [hr] Now for the development pieces.
My plan for this server is complete balance, were not leaning for economy, or a player-killing based server, I want an all around balanced server. I wish to provide the players with that old-school feeling, while introducing new and unique features to the players.
As for becoming a Zero Hour developer, you must learn to be efficient, meaning, if whatever you're designing really isn't practical, don't make it. The most important thing though is [b]communication[/b], I'm not going to boss you around or anything, if you don't want to program at a particular time, that's fine with me, I understand you wish to do other things, but, if you are going out of town, you must let me know. I've had developers that just disappeared on me before, not good.
Now, here is some media of what I have done/started so far:
[center][IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Welcome.png[/img][/center] [center]Using the correct packet, numbers just aren't right, which will be done later.[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/NPCSpawning.png[/img][/center] [center]Got working NPC spawning using DOM XML, it's pretty ugly right now, I'll fix it up later. Also has correct NPC Definitions, thanks Ryley for releasing that <3[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Eating.png[/img][/center] [center]Got a working eating system, works pretty nice.[/center]
I also have working prayer, and some other small features that aren't relevant enough to show or talk about.
[hr]
Now, I also plan to add my club/guild system in this server, like my old one, so that will need to be added. As you can tell, this is in a very early stage, so only apply if you love programming, and will be dedicated to this project, thanks!
[hr]
[center][b]The Team[/b][/center] [center][b]Owner[/b] -Me [b]Head Developer[/b] - devenb123 [/center]

Years programming: 2
Have you done any work outside of RSPS? No, I’m 14.
Time zone: Eastern US.
List some work you have done in RSPS: Demolitionx, check my thread.
What can you do for this development? I would like to help develop.
What kind of work would you prefer doing for Zero Hour (Client, core, content development, etc.)? Content Development.
Are you experienced with using Github? No.

PS: My server is shards.[/quote]
Only way to get accepted is to dump your other project, otherwise you would be in.

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

tyb97:

I cannot trust you due to recent events, but your application is under review.

I’m glad you said that, Tyb. No offence Frank, we’ve known each other a while. But just from that hello world program you made shows me your lack of knowledge, I suggest learning from Oracle themselves using the really big index instead of dodging around shitty sites (I think that’s what you’ve been doing since you did with other languages).
